mapper.insert: insert into member(email, name, password, birth, gender, phone_num, reg_date, admin) values(#{email },#{name },#{password },#{birth }, #{gender }, #{phone_num }, now(), 0);
mapper.select: select * from member where email=#{email } and password=#{password };
mapper.delete: delete from member where email=#{email } and password=#{password };
mapper.update: update member set password=#{password },name=#{name },phone_num=#{phone_num} where email = #{email };
